message.content: {"given_definition_quality":89,"better_definition":"steamed stuffed bun","sentence":"我爱吃包子。","image_prompt":"A child happily eating a steamed stuffed bun at a simple table. The bun is open to show savory filling inside. The setting is minimal and features warm, end-of-the-world daylight streaming through a bare window. Elements appear soft and slightly dreamlike, with gentle post-apocalyptic touches: faded posters on the wall, overgrown plants peeking through cracks, but the mood is peaceful and cheerful. Soft apocalypse animation style, rich but muted color palette.","sentence_translation":"I love to eat steamed stuffed buns."}
